title: [M-01] Incorrect bonus percentages for partner and referrer
summary: The report is about a bug in the `VisibilityCredits` contract. The severity of the bug is low, but the likelihood of it occurring is high. The bug is related to the incorrect setting of two values, `PARTNER_FEE` and `PARTNER_REFERRER_BONUS`, which are currently set to 250 ppm (0.025%) instead of the intended 0.25%. This means that partners and referrers will receive a lower bonus than intended from the total cost of bought credits. The recommendation is to update the values to 2500 ppm (0.25%) to fix the bug.
